name: Bloodew Valley
description:
For the Ludum Dare 41, I mixed a farming simulator game (such as Harvest Moon or Stardew Valley) and a survival horror game.

The instructions and credits are inside the game. If you are in a hurrry, you can press C to cheat so you get more gold and life. You can also skip the day cycle with N (and advance to 6PM by pressing it one more time).

I do recommend you read the instructions on the main menu. If you pay attention to the messages when playing a new game, that's also enough. If you do neither, it will probably be confusing (the most confusing thing: if you don't have 2000g by the end of the second day, that you can earn by planting 10 carrots or cheating, you will die).

I hope you like it! Thanks for playing!

LD41 page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/bloodew-valley

Ps.: WebGL build has a bugged cursor, sadly, so I won't upload it.

Known bugs:

  • If you alt+tab, your cursor will be screwed
  • The menu that appears when you press escape doesn't work
